name: Business Coaching
description: In short, business coaching is a collaborative relationship between a business owner or CEO and a professional coach, aimed at strategically developing a successful business.

name: Personal Development
description: From our free 30-Day Challenge to the eight-week Compassion Cultivation TrainingÂ® course, Compassion It offers programs for individuals who are seeking more meaningful and connected lives.

name: Performance Coaching
description: We will give a series of techniques aiming to bring about continuous improvement in an individual. It's a feedback mechanism between two parties, a coach and a student, whereby the process of learning and development is fostered through detailed feedback.
